/dev_hdd0/game/HANTOOLBX/USRDIR/IMAGES/inj_coldboot.png Inject Coldboots (Boot Logo and Sound) Copy coldboot_*.* to dev_flash/vsh/resource/coldboot_*.* webrender_plugin http://ps3xploit.com/coldboot/coldboot-installer.html
/dev_hdd0/game/HANTOOLBX/USRDIR/IMAGES/inj_rco.png Inject RCO (System Resource) Copy *.rco to dev_flash/vsh/resource/*.rco webrender_plugin http://ps3xploit.com/flash_rco_replacer/flash_rco_replacer.html
/dev_hdd0/game/HANTOOLBX/USRDIR/IMAGES/inj_xml.png Inject XML (XMB Layout) Copy *.xml to dev_flash/vsh/resource/explore/xmb/*.xml webrender_plugin http://ps3xploit.com/flash_xml_replacer/flash_xml_replacer.html
